title: Introducing: Alessandra
body:
A former winner of the Denniz Pop Awards (previous winners include Swedish House Mafia and Tove Lo), recognising rising Scandinavian talent, **Alessandra** arrives with quite a weight on her shoulders, yet manages to more than fulfil it with her mesmerising debut, _Your River_.

An out and out pop gem, it’s as much London Grammar as it is Adele – we’re talking real stadium filling ambitions. Check it out below.

An out and out pop gem, it’s as much London Grammar as it \[…\]
